name: An aqueous mixture of peroxyacetic acid (PAA)
hydrogen peroxide (HP)
acetic acid
1-diphosphonic acid (HEDP)
sulfuric acid
FoodContactSubstance: An aqueous mixture of peroxyacetic acid (PAA) (CAS Reg. No. 79-21-0), hydrogen peroxide (HP) (CAS Reg. No. 7722-84-1), acetic acid (CAS Reg. No. 64-19-7), 1-hydroxyethylidene-1,1-diphosphonic acid (HEDP) (CAS Reg. No. 2809-21-4), water, and, optionally, sulfuric acid (CAS Reg. No. 7664-93-9).
